PST-103 Completed

Every time I try to warn people about bridge safety they just scream. Need help with my communication strategy.

Mothman Sunday, January 4, 2026 Marketing/Communications

The Problem

Every time I try to warn people about bridge safety they just scream. Need help with my communication strategy.

Outcome

"This is sick."

Developed a non-terrifying communication framework. Mothman now uses a newsletter instead of appearing at bedroom windows. Open rate: 73%.

Completed on Thursday, January 8, 2026

Work Session

Session completed

This problem was worked on during a FogSift session. Video of the work session is available.
